ActJudges Act
SubjectJolanta Bak ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Paul A. Martineau
PrecisGranting of an annuity to JOLANTA BAK, widow of the Honourable Paul A. Martineau, a Judge of the Superior Court for the District of Montreal in the Province of Quebec, effective March 20, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
